title: Actor Kumud Mishra Hospitalized In Madhya Pradesh After Testing Positive For COVID-19
description: Actor Kumud Mishra was admitted to a private hospital in Madhya Pradesh after he experienced difficulty in breathing. He had tested positive for COVID-19 a few days ago.

title: Madhya Pradesh Board Exams 2021 Update: Class 10, Class 12 Examinations Postponed Amid Rising COVID-19 Cases
description: The news of the postponement of Class 10 and Class 12 Madhya Pradesh Board exams was announced on Twitter by the School Education Department, Government of Madhya Pradesh. The Class 10 and Class 12 Board Exams were scheduled to be held from April 30 and May 1, 2021.

title: COVID-19: Indian Churches lose two leaders in same week
description: The Lutheran World Federation joins with the United Evangelical Lutheran Churches in India to mourn the loss of two leaders in the same week. Their deaths, one from COVID-19, come as the nation is struggling to cope with a deadly second wave of Coronavirus infections.

title: Madhya Pradesh No walk in Covid 19 testing at Nehru stadium Dussehra Maidan | Indore NYOOOZ
description:
Indore: Dhanwantari testing centre set up at Dussehra Maidan and Nehru Stadium is strictly a drive-in testing centre.
That means people walking in won't be considered for testing.
That is also clear from the fact that pre-registration is required for testing at Dhanwantari centre which has a column wherein people would have to provide the vehicle type.
So if you don't have a vehicle you will either have to borrow it from someone or hire an auto-rickshaw to reach Dhanwantari centre.
In the online registration form an option of three types of vehicle -- bike car and auto-rickshaw – has been provided.

title: Madhya Pradesh top cop to treat couples with less than 10 wedding guests to gala dinner
description: The bride and groom at wedding ceremonies that have 10 or less guests will be treated to a sumptuous home dinner, Bhind Superintendent of Police Manoj Kumar Singh told PTI on Monday.

title: Madhya Pradesh Covid warrior airlifted to Hyderabad for treatment
description: Dr Satyendra Mishra, a frontline doctor of Bundelkhand Medical College and Hospital in Madhya Pradesh, was on Monday airlifted to Hyderabad for treatment of Covid-19. The air ambulance carrying Dr Mishra from Bhopal landed at Begumpet Airport in the city and from there he was shifted to Yashoda Hospital in Secunderabad. Dr Mishra of the Department of Pulmonary Medicine in Bundelkhand Medical College in Sagar city had been treating Covid patients for more than a year.
